column1: This file contains a prioritized list of user stories for the RegAI Copilot.

column2: As an analyst, I want to perform a semantic search across all ingested regulations so I can find relevant text without knowing exact keywords.
As an analyst, I want to see the source document, page, and section for every piece of information returned by the AI.
As a manager, I want a dashboard showing the status of all new regulations and our team's assessment progress.
As an analyst, I want to receive email alerts for new regulations published in my specific jurisdiction.
As a user, I want to export my analysis and citations to a PDF file for sharing with stakeholders.
